title: noe67: Warawanai Sexaroid
original_name: noe67 ～笑わないセクサロイド～
sinopse:
When mechanic Saga is looking for useful pieces in the junk, he finds a gorgeous android. He decides to keep and get him running again—not without consequences. Because soon he shall find out, that the android wasn't just a model back in the days, but also programmed to satisfy certain needs...

(Source: Egmont Manga, translated)
